Intense Images

Intense Images is a full screen modal built for high definition images.

The Intense Images library came out as part of the Aquatilis project. It allows you to click on images, and experience them within the full browser window, with little to no overhead.

You can see it active in the image above, but I really recommend checking out the live demo, to get the full experience.
